string.text: Find a Fireball artifact
Barman needs a Fireball delivered for one of his customers. Delivering it will likely lead to a good reward.
Find me a Fireball artifact. As of late, people have been bringing it in less and less, and I just got an order for that wonder. You up for it?
Bring the Fireball to Barman
I have the artifact in my backpack. Now I need to bring it to Barman.
Find a Crystal Thorn artifact
Another artifact order from Barman, this one being for a Crystal Thorn. A rare artifact, but with a reasonable pay.
This time around, the order is more serious. Find me a Crystal Thorn and you'll be well rewarded.
Bring the Crystal Thorn to Barman
I found the artifact. Let's see what Barman will offer for it.
Find a Goldfish artifact
This time, Barman's looking for a rarity: the Goldfish. I hope I can dig it up somewhere.
This is my last artifact order at the moment: the Goldfish. If you get me it, I won't leave you dry.
Bring the Goldfish to Barman
Artifact found. Considering its rarity, Barman should spare no expense on the reward.
Find two flesh eyes
Barman is interested in two flesh eyes. I wouldn't call this a hard task — mutant pigs are quite common.
Scientists at the Agroprom occasionally order various monster parts from me and other traders. Right now, I need two flesh eyes. Can you handle it?
Bring the flesh eyes to Barman
I have the flesh eyes. Time to return to Barman for the reward.
Find four boar hooves
Barmen asked me to get him four boar hooves. Like flesh, finding boars should be an easy task.
Yet another order for mutant body parts: four boar hooves. If you get it, you'll be handsomely rewarded.
Bring the boar hooves to Barmen
I have the boar hooves. Now to bring this filthy stuff to Barman.
Find a snork foot
Barmen's ordered a snork foot. I wonder where I can run into one of these things.
I've got another scientist order for mutant body parts. Think you can find a snork foot?
Bring the snork foot to Barman.
It was hard enough cutting off this gross foot from an equally gross creature. Time to collect my reward.
